title: Manage
description: This project required me to build a fully responsive landing page to the designs provided. I used Angular, along with Tailwind Css.I used SplideJs for the areas that required interactivity, such as the testimonial slider.

title: Hangman
description: This project required me to build a game to the designs provided. I used Angular, along with Tailwind and Typescript for the areas that required interactivity

title: Insure
description: This was a small project which mostly consisted of HTML and CSS. I built a fully-responsive landing page. The only JavaScript this project required was to enable the toggling of the mobile navigation.

title: Countries
description: This project was built in Angular and Tailwind. I had mobile and desktop designs to work to and built it so that it was fully-responsive. I took a mobile-first approach and used modern CSS like Flexbox and Grid for layout purposes.

title: Designo
description: This project required me to build a fully responsive multi page to the designs provided. I used Angular, along with Tailwind Css for the areas that required interactivity. Used Leaflet for the map section.
